title: Learn and master Non-verbal hypnosis techniques with Dr. Paret's masterclasses
description:
Dr. Paret's masterclass for non-verbal hypnosis teaches students from all over the world. Through the use of non-verbal hypnosis techniques we can enter a state of deep relaxation and experience a deeper connection with our body. In this way, we can align ourselves with the implicate level, or underlying level of reality described by physicist David Bohm, and attract the circumstances and experiences we desire. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
